help.en: MICHIBOT | A virtual mascot discord bot very funny! ;D

help.es:
**Michibot** es un bot de uso muy versatil tanto para usuarios nuevos y con experiencia en discord :D

Adopta un michi y cuida de el con estadÃ­sticas de diversiÃ³n, salud, amor y comida. Tienes una tienda para comprarle cosas, unos minigames para que te diviertas, Â¡y muchas otras cosas mas! :D.
*Para llamar a tu michi debes usar la palabra **mish, michi o ps ps***

<a:admiration_white:981331550568341554>[Soporte](https://discord.gg/EKCjk2JEXD)
help.en:
**MichiBot** is a very versatile bot for new users and experienced discord users :D

Adopt a michi(kitten) and take care of him with fun, health, love and food stats. You have a store to buy things for him, some minigames for you to have fun and many other things! :D. 
*To call your michi you must use the word **mish, michi or ps ps***
\<a:admiration_white:981331550568341554>[Support](https://discord.gg/EKCjk2JEXD)
